name: com.cowboybob.pandemonium-dialogue-system
description:
Dialogue system mainly created by Pandemonium Games. Used to add Dialogue to Npc's and Players. 
Detects on collision and pops up a dialogue window.
Types letters one by one with a sound. 
Has the ability to skip through dialogue sections or exit 
early. 
Can take in the characters sprite to show in dialogue
window.
Text can be adjusted by color and font.
Delay between letters easily adjusted too.
